snippet.title: The Liminal Dimension - Official Trailer | Psychological Horror Game 2024 | Liminal Space
snippet.description:
The Liminal Dimension - Official Trailer | Psychological Horror Game 2024

Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3137560/The_Liminal_Dimension/

Description:
Immerse yourself in the dark and surreal world of "The Liminal Dimension," a psychological horror game that will push the boundaries of your perception and sanity. In this unsettling realm of liminal spaces, where silence and emptiness reign, every decision could be the key to your escape… or drag you deeper into the nightmare.

Inspired by the latest trends in horror gaming, "The Liminal Dimension" transforms liminal spaces into a stage for your deepest fears. Experience the eerie atmosphere, déjà vu effect, and unpredictable gameplay that make every step more terrifying than the last.

🕹️ Key Features:

Eerie Atmosphere: Liminal spaces teetering on the edge of reality and dream, creating an immersive and unsettling environment.
Déjà Vu Effect: Each loop is slightly different, yet hauntingly familiar, intensifying the sense of dread.
Linear yet Unpredictable Gameplay: Navigate mazes where the line between past and present blurs, leaving you uncertain of what’s real.
Psychological Horror: Fear that transcends what you see on screen, creeping into your mind.
Will you find your way out of "The Liminal Dimension," or will you be lost forever in this nightmarish reality?

🔔 Don’t miss the release! Add the game to your wishlist now and stay updated on the latest news.
